sentences.en: A slow metabolism is another major contributor to weight gain.
sentences.cn: 新陈代谢为体重增加做出了重大的贡献.

sentences.en: All this can lead to divisive family arguments to which guilt is a major contributor.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都能导致家庭意见不和，而内疚是其中的主要因素。

sentences.en: As a Contributor, you may read items and create new items.
sentences.cn: 作为投稿人, 您可以读取项目和创建项目.

sentences.en: Carbon dioxide is the largest contributor to the greenhouse effect.
sentences.cn: 二氧化碳太多是道致温室效应的最主要原因.

sentences.en: Enrichment and sedimentation are the principal contributor to the aging process of lakes.
sentences.cn: 富饶和沉淀是导致湖泊老化过程的主要原因.

sentences.en: Famous wine expert reaches wine column author, free contributor.
sentences.cn: 知名葡萄酒专家及葡萄酒专栏作者, 自由撰稿人.

sentences.en: He is a regular contributor to children's magazines.
sentences.cn: 他经常为儿童刊物写稿.

sentences.en: Radiotherapy is an important contributor to curative treatment of esophageal carcinoma.
sentences.cn: 放射治疗在食管癌的治疗中占有相当重要的地位.

sentences.en: Reporter Alan Nearn covers Central America and is a regular contributor to The New Yorker.
sentences.cn: 记者艾伦·尼恩负责在中美洲采访报道，定期向《纽约客》杂志投稿。

sentences.en: Screening Contributor articles, design layout and organize periodic summary.
sentences.cn: 筛选投稿文章, 设计版面及定期组织总结.

sentences.en: The largest contributor – the United States – was assessed $ 283,076,321.
sentences.cn: 会费最高的国家是美国,其摊款额为283076321美元.

sentences.en: This can be a contributor to duplicate content issues.
sentences.cn: 这页会导致重复内容问题.

sentences.en: VCO is the major contributor of the PLL output noise.
sentences.cn: 压控振荡器是锁相环噪声的主要来源.

sentences.en: When are an individual contributor, you try to have all the answers.
sentences.cn: 如果你单独工作, 就会试着找到所有答案.

words.tran_cn: 出资的；贡献的；有助于；助长...的
捐助的；贡献的；有助于…的

trans.tran_cn: 促成因素，作出贡献者，投稿人
trans.tran_en: someone who gives money, help, ideas etc to something that a lot of other people are also involved in
